/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and vehicles.
